title: Please help, We were unable to create your account for an unknown reason. Please try again
body:
My girlfriend is trying to create an account but it keeps giving this message 
"We were unable to create your account for an unknown reason. Please try again, if the problem persists please contact our support team".

I'm real tired of these little issues that always happen and I've googled it and I find no answer.

replies.body:
Huh.....well that's pretty weird. I haven't personally ever seen or encountered this error in my time helping on the boards so far. I want to first make sure that she isn't possibly using an email that's already been verified by a different account, so make sure that she uses an original email when signing up. If that doesn't work, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and maybe a different browser entirely.

At the end of the day if nothing seems to help at all, have your girlfriend shoot us an email at support@riotgames.com with a screenshot of that error so we can take a closer look for her!

Thanks for the fast reply, we managed to sort it.
We started to download the client and restarted the browser and sign up worked after that.
Weeeeeiiiiiiiird.......but ayyyyy I'm glad she finally got her account created ^_^!
